pages.text: There are 7 traits that allow mobs to apply vanilla potion effects.
This trait allows mobs to apply blindness effect, which significantly reduce sight.
This trait allows mobs to apply nausea effect, which significantly distorts sight.
This trait allows mobs to apply levitation effect.
This trait allows mobs to apply slowness effect.
This trait allows mobs to apply weakness effect.
This trait allows mobs to apply poison effect.
This trait allows mobs to apply wither effect.
